title: Correction: Motivating factors for physical activity participation among individuals with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease: A qualitative study applying the motivation, opportunity, and ability model
content: by Yuanyu Liao, Jiaohua Yu, Yuxin Zhan, Yunfang Liu, Yaoling Zhou, Huan Wang, Xinghong Liu, Weiwei Wang, Yu Ma, Fenfen Lan
